message: Let's start fair. Take 10% and I'll keep the rest. We can work out a better deal later if you're not happy.
Let's split it closer to the middle. I'll take 55% and you get 45%.  This is a fair starting point, and we can adjust if necessary.
I understand your desire for a more even split. I'm willing to give you 45% but I need at least 55% to make it worthwhile. Let's find a compromise here.
